subject: Golf
Recordings and Downloads (Video)
lead_paragraph: As a golf video visionary — see my work at nytimes.com/golf — it is my duty to apprise the golf community of other notable works in the genre. Hence, golf’s first rap video presented by, of all people, Top-Flite golf balls. You know the brand, often regarded as a nonpremium ball (though nonetheless used by millions). Top-Flite is working to remake its image with a rapping golf superhero in a tight leotard named D2 Man (so named after the company’s new D2 balls).
